lead_paragraph: The New York Times critics Charles Isherwood (loved it) and Alastair Macaulay (loathed it) discuss their takes on Twyla Tharp’s “Come Fly Away.”
snippet: The New York Times critics Charles Isherwood (loved it) and Alastair Macaulay (loathed it) discuss their takes on Twyla Tharp’s “Come Fly Away.”

headline.main: One Loves It. One Loathes It. ‘That’s Life.’
headline.seo: Isherwood and Macaulay Spar Over ‘Come Fly Away’
headline.print_headline: One Loves It. One Loathes It. ‘That’s Life.’

byline.original: By CHARLES ISHERWOOD and ALASTAIR MACAULAY
